ComicInfo.Summary:
Two classic Capcom fighting franchises collide as the martial artists of Street Fighter are haunted by the mad monsters of Darkstalkers! The crossover chaos all starts in this special prelude issue!
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------- A | Cover A | Edwin Huang | 1 | B | Cover B | Jean-Baptist Nanteau | 2 | C | 1:10 Retailer Incentive Cover C | Joe Vriens | 3 | RE | Fried Pie Exclusive Variant Cover | Jean-Baptiste Nanteau | 4 | *Notes:* The 1:10 Retailer Incentive Cover is a homage of the movie poster for Frankenstein Meets the Wolf Man.
https://comicvine.gamespot.com/street-fighter-vs-darkstalkers-0-stalked/4000-582598/
ComicInfo.Title: Stalked!
